title: My Captain
description: A Blackstone Affair novel. Spinoff. Book 2 in a series immediately following CHERRY GIRL.What happens when you want something so badly you believe your life can't have a happy ending without it? Do you fight on, or do you find the grace to accept what fate offers you?The story of Neil and Elaina continues as they embark upon their life together, but not without its challenges for the newlyweds.
author: Raine Miller
